item.description:
This is a three week climbing clinic for all beginner climbers.  We have had a lot of people join that are looking to Learn the "ropes" of climbing, including belay, knot tying and climbing techniques.   I offer these classes to introduce you to the sport or refresh your memory from years past.  When the rock is dry (this will be soon!) and we're climbing outside this will make it easier for you to join in the climbing with the group. 

The class will run Tues March 20, 6-8pm March 27, 6-8pm April 3, 6-8pm

Each class is $15 including gear.  Or all three are $40.  I offer the classes at a very discount price to group members, but if you would like to bring a friend they can get the same discount. 

If Tues does not work for you or you would like to schedule a private lesson ($20) let me know and we can arrange it.  Let get you started in the sport of rock climbing! 

Please respond ASAP as I am limiting the class size. 

Thanks,
Kellie
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the sign out front
item.name: Climbing Clinic for beginners
